member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.CallBack
member.summary: Process event notifications received by the webhook method

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.CallBack.Process(System.String)
member.summary: Process event notifications received from DocuSign
member.param: JSON event payload received from DocuSign
member.returns: EnvelopeModel object populated with data from DocuSign

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig
member.summary: Configuration for ECAR.DocuSign access.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.AccountID
member.summary: Your DocuSign organization number (also known as Account ID).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.ClientID
member.summary: Your DocuSign integration key (also known as Client ID).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.UserGUID
member.summary: DocuSign User ID to send as (also known as API Username).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.AuthServer
member.summary: DocuSign server to connect to. Use: 'account-d.docusign.com' for Development. Use: 'account.docusign.com' for Production.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.RSAKey
member.summary: DocuSign RSA Security key. Pass contents of the key file as UTF8 byte array (not the file name).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.AccessToken
member.summary: DocuSign Access Token (read only).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.AccessTokenExpiration
member.summary: DocuSign Access Token Expiration Date (read only).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.BasePath
member.summary: DocuSign server path to use (internal).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.APISuffix
member.summary: DocuSign service endpoint (internal).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.DocuSignConfig.Ready
member.summary: Configuration readiness indicator.

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.Presets
member.summary: Available types of DocuSign fields (tabs) for prefilling.

member.name: F:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.Presets.Date
member.summary: A date field in the DocuSign document. Pass a formatted value (##/##/####).

member.name: F:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.Presets.Text
member.summary: A text field in the DocuSign document.

member.name: F:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.Presets.Ssn
member.summary: An SSN field in the DocuSign document. Pass a formatted value (###-##-####).

member.name: F:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.Presets.Checkbox
member.summary: A checkbox field in the DocuSign document. Pass "true"/"false" as value.

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset
member.summary: Data model for prefilling fields in a DocuSign document.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset.Label
member.summary: The name of the field to set in the DocuSign document.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset.Value
member.summary: The value to set in the DocuSign document.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset.Type
member.summary: The type of field in the DocuSign document.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset.Locked
member.summary: Specifies whether the pre-filled field should be locked for user entry. Default: false (not locked).

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel
member.summary: Data model for documents sent for signature via ECAR.DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.SignerEmail
member.summary: Email address for the recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.SignerName
member.summary: Display name for the recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.SignerId
member.summary: The recipient's identifier in the calling application (e.g. tracking number).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.DSRoleName
member.summary: Name of the DocuSign recipient role.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.DSTemplateName
member.summary: Name of the DocuSign template to use.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.DSEmailSubject
member.summary: Subject line for the email sent from DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.DSEnvelopeId
member.summary: Envelope ID returned from the DocuSign ceremony.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.DSDocumentId
member.summary: Document ID returned from the DocuSign ceremony.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel.DSPreviewUrl
member.summary: Envelope Preview URL returned from the DocuSign.

member.summary: Envelope ID returned from the DocuSign ceremony.

member.summary: Document ID from DocuSign (integer ID for actual documents, 'certificate' for certificates).

member.summary: Document GUID used by DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeDocumentModel.Order
member.summary: Signature sequence order of the document (999 for certificates).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeDocumentModel.Name
member.summary: Name of the document.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeDocumentModel.Type
member.summary: Type of the document ('content' for documents, 'summary' for certificates).

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel
member.summary: Data model for envelopes retrieved from DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.LastModifiedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the item was last modified (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.ExpireEnabled
member.summary: If the envelope is set to expire

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.ExpireDateTime
member.summary: The expiration DateTime, if exists (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.ExpireAfter
member.summary: Expiration ticks in minutes.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.VoidedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the envelope or template was voided, if exists (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.StatusChangedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the status changed (UTC/ISO)..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.Status
member.summary: Indicates the envelope's current status.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.SentDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the envelope was sent (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.EnvelopeId
member.summary: The GUID identifier for the envelope.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.VoidedReason
member.summary: The reason the envelope or template was voided, if exists.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.CompletedDateTime
member.summary: Specifies the date and time this item was completed, if exists (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: Indicates the date and time the item was created (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.EmailSubject
member.summary: Specifies the subject of the email that is sent to all recipients, if exists.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.EmailBlurb
member.summary: Text that is included in email body for all envelope recipients, if exists.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.DeclinedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the recipient declined the document, if exists (UTC/ISO).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeModel.DeliveredDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the envelope was delivered (UTC/ISO).

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel
member.summary: Data model for document recipients retrieved from DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.RecipientId
member.summary: Recipient ID (friendly) returned from DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.ClientUserId
member.summary: Client specific Id for the recipient (empty for emailed DocuSign documents).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.DeclinedDateTime
member.summary: Date the recipient declined to sign (if available).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.DeclinedReason
member.summary: Reason the recipient declined to sign (if available).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.DeliveredDateTime
member.summary: Date the envelope was delivered to this recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.Email
member.summary: Email address for the recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.Name
member.summary: Name of the recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.Status
member.summary: Status of the DocuSign envelope for this recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.RecipientType
member.summary: The recipient type for this recipient (signer/witness etc.).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.RoleName
member.summary: The role name for this recipient.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.SignatureName
member.summary: Name provided by the recipient to DocuSign at signature ceremony.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.SignedDateTime
member.summary: Date and time the recipient completed the DocuSign ceremony (if available).

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.EnvelopeRecipientModel.DSUserGUID
member.summary: Recipient GUID used by DocuSign.

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel
member.summary: Data model for expiration settings for documents sent via ECAR.DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel.ExpirationEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether expiration is enabled.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel.ExpireAfterDays
member.summary: Envelope will expire after this many days.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel.ExpireWarnDays
member.summary: Expiration warning will be sent this many days before.

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel
member.summary: Data model for setting up DocuSign notification to a callback/webhook method.

member.name: F:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel.EnvelopeEvents
member.summary: List of envelope event codes to get notifications for. Valid values are: "Sent", "Completed", "Declined", "Delivered", "Voided".

member.name: F:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel.WebHookUrl
member.summary: SSL URL of the public endpoint to which notifications are sent as JSON.

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel
member.summary: Data model for reminder notifications for documents sent via ECAR.DocuSign.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel.ReminderEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether a reminder is enabled.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel.ReminderDelayDays
member.summary: First reminder will be sent after this many days.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel.ReminderFrequencyDays
member.summary: Frequency of reminder emails after the first (in days).

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.DSCONFIG_NOT_SET
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DocuSign configuration not set..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.EMPTY_DOCUMENT_ID
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DocuSign document ID cannot be null or blank..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.EMPTY_ENVELOPE_ID
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DocuSign envelope ID cannot be null or blank..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.EMPTY_STARTDATE_VALUE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Start date cannot be null..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.EMPTY_TAB_LABEL
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DocuSign tab label cannot be null or blank..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.EMPTY_VOIDED_REASON
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Voided reason cannot be null or blank..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.FIELD_x_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Named field {0} was not found in the DocuSign document..

member.name: P:ECAR.DocuSign.Properties.Resources.TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND_x
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DocuSign template not found: {1}..

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.Status
member.summary: Access documents signed using ECAR.DocuSign.

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetAllEnvelopes(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get a list of all DocuSign envelope IDs starting from a given date.
member.param: The date to start querying from
member.returns: List of all envelopes from the given date as EnvelopeModel objects

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetAllRecipients(System.String)
member.summary: Get a list of all DocuSign envelope recipients for a given envelope ID.
member.param: The envelope ID to query
member.returns: List of all recipients for the envelope as a list of RecipientModel objects

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSCheckStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Check the status of the DocuSign signature ceremony.
member.param: GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
member.returns: Status of the document (any, created, deleted, sent, delivered, signed, completed, declined, timedout, voided)

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSVoidEnvelope(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Void, or cancel, an envelope that was sent to a recipient. *** THIS ACTION IS IRREVERSIBLE! *** Note: You cannot void draft or completed envelopes.
member.param: GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Reason for voiding the envelope
member.returns: boolean

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSResendEnvelope(System.String)
member.summary: Resend a previously sent DocuSign envelope (in 'created', 'sent' or 'delivered' states).
member.param: GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
member.returns: Boolean result from DocuSign call

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetAllDocuments(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve info about the documents contained in a DocuSign envelope. If envelope was signed, the signer's DocuSign certificate is appended to this list.
member.param: GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
member.returns: List of all documents in the requested envelope as EnvelopeDocumentModel objects.

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a document from DocuSign.
member.param: GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
ID of the document within the DocuSign envelope
member.returns: File stream of the document retrieved from DocuSign

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentCheckBoxField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user selected value of a named check-box within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the check box in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: Returns the check box's selected value as a string ("true" or "false")

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentTextField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user provided value of a named text field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the text field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: User entered text in the field

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentSsnField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user provided value for a named SSN field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the SSN field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: User entered SSN text in the field

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentDateSignedField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the value for a named date of signature field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the date field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: Date signed as set in the named field

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentDateField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user provided value for a named date field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the date field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: User provided date value in the named field

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentFirstNameField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user provided value for a named First Name field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the date field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: User provided first name in the named field

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentLastNameField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user provided value for a named Last Name field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the date field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: User provided last name value in the named field

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.Status.DSGetDocumentSignHereField(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the user signature status for a named sign-here field within a DocuSign document.
member.param: Tab label of the date field in the DocuSign template
GUID of the DocuSign envelope sent to the signer
Document ID (optional; if not passed, defaults to first document in the envelope)
member.returns: Returns one of: "active", "signed", "declined" or "na" (e.g. for optional signature fields)

member.name: T:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign
member.summary: ECAR.DocuSign embedded signing ceremony with a predefined document template.

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.CreateDocuSignPreview(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Internal private method to call DocuSign to create (not send) an envelope for preview
member.param: Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
Reminder data
Expiration Data
Notification callback webhook Data
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: EnvelopeSummary object with result from DocuSign call

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.ExecuteDocuSign(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Internal private method to call DocuSign for both embedded and asynchronous (email) signing
member.param: Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
Reminder data
Expiration Data
Notification callback webhook Data
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: EnvelopeSummary object with result from DocuSign call

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.EmbeddedTemplateSign(System.String,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Initiate embedded signing ceremony with DocuSign.
member.param: Return URL that DocuSign should transfer control to after the embedded signing cermony is complete ('?envelopeId=[id]' will be appended)
Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: DocuSign URL for embedded signing

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.EmbeddedTemplateSign(System.String,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Initiate embedded signing ceremony with DocuSign (with reminder and expiration settings).
member.param: Return URL that DocuSign should transfer control to after the embedded signing cermony is complete ('?envelopeId=[id]' will be appended)
Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
Reminder details if required for DocuSign envelope
Expiration details if required for the DocuSign envelope
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: DocuSign URL for embedded signing

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.EmailedTemplateSign(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Send a DocuSign for asynchronous signing via email.
member.param: Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: DocuSign envelope status

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.EmailedTemplateSign(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Send a DocuSign for asynchronous signing via email (with reminder and expiration settings).
member.param: Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
Reminder details if required for DocuSign envelope
Expiration details if required for the DocuSign envelope
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: DocuSign envelope status

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.EmailedTemplateSignWithCallBack(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Send a DocuSign for asynchronous signing via email (with reminder and expiration settings).
member.param: Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
Reminder details if required for DocuSign envelope
Expiration details if required for the DocuSign envelope
Notification callback webhook details
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: DocuSign envelope status

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.CreatePreviewURL(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel@,System.String,System.Boolean,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ReminderModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.ExpirationModel,ECAR.DocuSign.Models.NotificationCallBackModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocPreset})
member.summary: Create a preview URL for the DocuSign document to review that the recipients will see.
member.param: Document data (in: document & signer info; out: DocuSign envelope & document ID)
Return URL that DocuSign should transfer control when the preview is closed
Indicates whether the DocuSign envelope will be sent by mail or in an embedded ceremony
Reminder details if required for DocuSign envelope
Expiration details if required for the DocuSign envelope
Notification callback webhook details
(Optional) Fields to prefill in the DocuSign document
member.returns: DocuSign URL for recipient preview

member.name: M:ECAR.DocuSign.TemplateSign.SendPreviewedEnvelope(ECAR.DocuSign.Models.DocumentModel)
member.summary: Send a previously created DocuSign envelope for signature.
member.param: Document data populated with the DocuSign envelope ID of the preview
member.returns: Boolean result from DocuSign call
